title: Breuckelen - experimental sans-serif
content:
This is a face I designed when in New York last summer. It's really two faces, one plain sans and one, well, experimental variant.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample-580_5326.png)

[http://glyphobet.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/sample-800.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172204/http:/glyphobet.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/sample-800.png "http://glyphobet.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/sample-800.png")

There will probably never be lowercase. I haven't designed numerals or punctuation yet. Let me know what you think.
author: glyphobet

comments.content: I like the broken decorative face. It has something postmodern urbanism in it...

I'm pleased to announce that [Breuckelen is now available for purchase at MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172204/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/glyphobet/breuckelen/):

For the first week, (until March 11th) Typophile readers will get a 20% discount with the code TYPOMAR10.
